DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect maternal hydration oral isotonic solution water amniotic fluid ( AF ) index woman normohydramnios .
DOC.brief_title: Study Maternal Hydration Increase Amniotic Fluid Index
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To determine effect maternal hydration oral isotonic solution water amniotic fluid ( AF ) index woman normohydramnios . Subjects Methods : Women normal AF index gestational age 33 36 week without maternal complication randomize three group ( isotonic solution , water , control ) . The isotonic solution water group instruct drink 1.5L respective solution ; control group instruct drink 200mL water . AF index measure hydration . The investigator perform AF index blind subject 's group . Results : Ninety-nine woman complete study without maternal adverse effect . The mean increase amniotic fluid index hydration significantly great isotonic solution water group ( 12.1mm , p=0.02 ; 13.1mm , p=0.05 ; respectively ) control group ( 1.4mm , p=0.74 ) . There significant difference isotonic solution water group . Hydration isotonic solution water improve chance 20 % increase amniotic fluid index 10.2 ( 95 % CI 1.9-98.9 ) 6.0 ( 95 % CI 1.0-45.5 ) time respectively . Conclusion : Maternal hydration isotonic solution water increase AF index woman normohydramnios .
DOC.criteria: gestational age 33 36 week singleton pregnancy intact membrane initial AF index 5 95 per cent maternal complication fetal structural malformation evidence fetal distress nonstress test
